attr.title: Q2Pro
attr.desc: Enhanced Quake 2 engine with work-in-progress support for the Nightdive remaster.  Includes support for mods/mission packs The Reckoning, Ground Zero, Zaero, and the Nightdive remaster.
attr.inst:
Copy the files from your Quake 2 installation to the matching folders in ports/q2pro.  For example, copy the contents of Quake 2/baseq2 into ports/q2pro/baseq2.  If you have the Nightdive remaster, copy the contents of its baseq2 folder (Quake 2/rerelease/baseq2) into ports/q2pro/rerelease, and copy Q2Game.kpf to ports/q2pro.

Please don't overwrite the .cfg files in baseq2 as the controls may break, but feel free to edit them to your liking.
